attributes.action: Reduce One Of The Many Taxes and Help The Self Employed People Of The United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For many years the self employed of this country have been forced to pay a "hidden" tax called Class 4 Contribution. It is a "hidden" tax of 8% of a self employed persons net profit. Class 4 is is compulsory and not an accountant in the land can explain why we have to pay it,or where it goes [other than the Treasury of course]. If this tax was scrapped it would have no impact on the overall financial state we are currently in BUT it would greatly assist all the self employed people in the U.K.
